item.title: BEAT: A breath of fresh air
item.author: Sid Basetti,Maria Greca,
item.description: BEAT is at the forefront of contemporary dance, choreographed by Igor and Moreno, performed by Margarita Elliot. This production has taken four years to reach fruition and is the second piece from this duo. The choreography encourages introspection and plunges into the millennial psyche. It will â€¦
